about_the_game:
Help Bob solve his problems, both in the real world, a totally chaotic and depressing world, and in the world of his own dreams, or as we will call it, Nightmares.

GAMEPLAY



In the world of nightmares, you will face the most diverse enemies and of course, their bosses such as depression, anguish, pain and even death. You will be able to customize your weapons and in the course of the stages that you go through, you will be able to obtain skills making you stronger. Besides, you'll have a main skill, the super dash, which will help you escape the most dangerous stages.

SKILLS



After each level, you will enter a zone (limbo) where you will have the option of being able to buy a skill of your choice and then getting stronger the more you progress through the levels.

BOSSES



You'll go through several levels of nightmare, and the deeper, the worse it will be and in addition to everything, each level will have a boss who will try to stop you from continuing your journey.

short_description: Nightmares is a 2D platform pixel art roguelike game that aims to unite the thriller and horror genres with shooter mechanics. In the game, you will be Bob, who faces different psychological problems that will become more and more frequent.
supported_languages: English, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
